name: Slime Alchemist
description:
Slime Alchemist combines roguelike deckbuilding and turn-based tactics with open-ended exploration, dynamic turn order, and enemy card crafting to create a unique strategic mix.

Features:

  • Set the pace of battle. The cards you play determine when enemies will act. Choose your cards wisely to unleash powerful combos on your foes.

  • Explore a procedurally generated world. Explore freely to refine your deck and gain powerful passives; but tread carefully, as each step makes your enemies stronger.

  • Build your deck from the techniques of vanquished foes. Every enemy drops its unique deck of cards on death; combine and sacrifice them to create your own hybrid fighting style.
